Please note that the translation part is done using an automatic translation tool and might not be perfect. 

**Important Details:**
- The contract is closed now.
- The contract is for Heavy Civil Works.
- The Trust Regulator is the Department of Public Works and Government Services
- The contract is opened for Component IX (Non-competitive Processes forStanding Offers and Capacity Procurement) of the Trade Agreement and it must be open to other Federal Government Department, or the General Service branch that represent the government ( component 3 of the Trade agreement) which illustrated that the vendor must bid to Tender Intern but not compete directly with most components. 
-  To obtain the tender documents, cookies must be enabled on the contracting entity website. 
- Vendor must have a HUB Option PL To access to PartnersHub Nordy
